name: Make the Right Choice
description: For a class I was tasked with creating a text-based game as my first project. I'd never made a game before, but it is something I am interested in and gaming is one of my passions. This is the first game I've made, and the first time I've used a game engine in this manner. It's not great, but I learned a lot about the Godot engine, and I think my next project is going to be a great improvement.
